     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     -d '{"mobile": "09033438205"}' \
     --proxy http://127.0.0.1:10808 \
     --insecure \
     -w "HTTP Status: %{http_code}\nTime: %{time_total}s\n" \
     --silent
